  • Bitcoin transactions are decentralized and cannot be reversed once initiated. Ensure the wallet address provided is accurate and belongs to you.
  • The exchange rate for Bitcoin will be based on the prevailing market rate at the time of the transaction. Rates may fluctuate rapidly due to market volatility.
  • You agree to confirm the exact BTC amount required for this transaction and transfer it within the specified time frame to avoid delays or cancellations.
  • Ensure that the network fee (minerâ€™s fee) is appropriately included when sending Bitcoin to guarantee timely processing.
  • Expres Pay is not liable for losses or delays caused by incorrect wallet addresses, network congestion, or blockchain-related issues.
  • This transaction is final and non-refundable unless explicitly stated in our Refund Policy.
  • All personal and transaction information will be securely processed and stored in compliance with our Privacy Policy.
